conclusion: The wooden rod is 5 m long and released from rest.
The upper end of the rod is fixed, so the rod rotates as it falls.
The lower end of the rod moves in a circular arc as it falls freely under gravity.
The upper end of the rod is fixed at a height of 20 m above the cylinder.
The lower end of the rod is initially 5 m below the upper end.
The lower end of the rod starts at a height of 15 m.
